Package piece

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • piece.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to be extended by every piece class (Rook, Knight, Bishop, Quuen, King, and Pawn)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean color  
      int xpos
      variables that every piece class will have x coordinate y coordinate color of the piece

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public boolean getColor()
        get the color of the current Piece
        Returns:
        the color of the Piece

      • isValidMove

        public abstract boolean isValidMove​(Box[][] b,
                                    int oldx,
                                    int oldy,
                                    int newx,
                                    int newy)
        abstract method that needs to be implemented in every class that extends Piece Check if the move by the Piece is legal
        Parameters:
        b - - the chess board
        oldx - - the original x coordinate for the piece that is going to be moved
        oldy - - the original y coordinate for the piece that is going to be moved
        newx - - the x coordinate the piece is moving to
        newy - - the y coordinate the piece is moving to
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise

      • check

        public abstract boolean check​(Box[][] b,
                              int newx,
                              int newy,
                              boolean p)
        abstract method that needs to be implemented in every class that extends Piece Check if opponent under check
        Parameters:
        b - - the chess board
        newx - - the x coordinate the piece is moving to
        newy - - the y coordinate the piece is moving to
        p - - which player's turn
        Returns:
        true if opponent under check, false otherwise
